Key Match Events: Kuldeep Yadav took 2 wickets for 24 runs.
Axar Patel took 1 wicket for 21 runs.
Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 37 runs.
Jasprit Bumrah took the crucial wicket of Travis Head.
Axar Patel took a stunning catch to dismiss Mitchell Marsh.
India scored 205/5 and Australia scored 181/7 in 20 overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with the team's performance and emphasized the importance of continuing their current form into the semi-final against England.
Mitch Marsh acknowledged India's superior performance and highlighted the small margins that can affect the outcome of a game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India reached the semi-final of the T20 World Cup 2024 undefeated.
The match was held in St Lucia.
Australia needed to score a minimum of 176 runs to stay in the race for the semi-finals.
